comments: Usually used the spelling Zoellner after plant names, sometimes the spelling Zöllner was used at the title.of article.
examples: Culcitium albifolium Zoellner in Anales Mus. Hist. Nat. Valparaiso 3: 65 (1970). Prosopis reptans var. chilensis Zoellner & M.Olivares in Not. Mens. Mus. Nacion. Hist. Nat. (Chile), 344: 11 (2001), as Zöllner at title .
source: IK db. Obit. in Gayana Bot., 65(1): VII-XI (2008), incl. bibliogr. and portr.
